oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Family photograph of Jack and Elizabeth Crozier and children, circa 1916
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Group photograph of Jack "Jackson" Crozier and his wife Elizabeth "Lizzie" Crozier with five of their eight children. Pictured left to right: Bronce Jr., John "Buck" Roe, Josephine "Jo" Nora, Hannah Mae, William Arthur "Sam" or "Strutt," Elizabeth Crozier, and Jack Crozier. The picture was likely taken on the family farm in Oliver Springs, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crozier, Jackson, 1861-1935; Crozier, Elizabeth "Lizzie" Robinson, -1929; Crozier, Bronce Jr.; Crozier, John "Buck" Roe; Crozier, Josephine "Jo" Nora; Crozier, Hannah Mae; Crozier, William Arthur "Sam" or "Strutt"; Crozier, Elizabeth; Crozier, Jack
Group portraits; African Americans--Tennessee--Oliver Springs; African American families--Tennessee--Oliver Springs
Oliver Springs (Tenn.)
